What is the work of a real estate agent? A real estate agent helps people buy, sell, or rent properties. They guide clients through the entire process, from finding the perfect home to closing the deal. Want to learn more about the role of a real estate agent and how to find the best one for your needs? Check out our guide to finding a real estate agent in Lagos . What is the difference between broker and real estate agent? A real estate agent works for a broker. Agents help people buy, sell, or rent properties. Brokers have more experience and can run their own real estate businesses. Who is the best real estate agent in Lagos? Bright Ugochukwu from Oparah Realty is a top real estate agent in Lagos. He provides expert guidance to help clients find their dream home or investment property. What do the best real estate agents do? The best real estate agents in Lagos help you buy or sell homes without any stress. They know the city really well, so they can find the right places for you to invest. They listen to what you want and work hard to get you a good deal. They also handle all the tricky paperwork, so you don’t have to worry. They make sure you understand everything and are happy with your choice. How much do most real estate agents charge? In Lagos, real estate agents usually get paid a percentage of the house’s selling price, called a commission. This amount can change, but it’s often between 5% and 10%. So, if your house sells for a lot, the agent gets more. It’s important to talk to your agent about their fees before you start working together to avoid surprises. How can I sell my house fast in Lagos? Sell your house fast in Lagos by pricing it right, making it look its best, and using a skilled real estate agent.
